title: We know that you care how information about you is used and shared, and we appreciate your trust that we will do so carefully and sensibly. This Privacy Notice describes how Amazon.com and its affiliates (collectively ) collect and process your personal information through Amazon websites, devices, products, services, online and physical stores, and applications that reference this Privacy Notice (together). By using Amazon Services, you are consenting to the practices described in this Privacy Notice.

notice.title: What Personal Information About Customers Does Amazon Collect?
notice.subtitle: We collect your personal information in order to provide and continually improve our products and services.

lists.title: Information You give us
lists.desc: We receive and store any information you provide in relation to Amazon Services. Click here to see examples of what we collect. You can choose not to provide certain information, but then you might not be able to take advantage of many of our Amazon Services.
